#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Build a Better
#Text=Relationship with Your New Stepchild
#Text=So you just got married .
#Text=That 's great !
#Text=If your new spouse has children already then you ’re also a new stepparent .
#Text=Stepchildren can be a blessing and a curse depending on your relationship , and if you ’re reading this article , you probably feel it ’s a curse .
#Text=It may seem difficult now , but with help and time , you may start to get along .
#Text=Read this article to start the journey of building a better relationship with your new stepchild .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Think of why he may be acting the way that he is .
#Text=Is he uncomfortable with the relationship ?
#Text=Perhaps you said something to him that he took the wrong way ?
#Text=Did you marry his mother right after causing the death of his father ?
#Text=These are all good questions to ask yourself in trying to assess your relationship and understand your new step son .
#Text=Since you are new to the child , let them set the pace of the relationship .
#Text=Younger children may be quicker to bond with you , while older children may be more reluctant to get close .
#Text=Do n’t force them to become close to you , as you cannot force trust or love .
#Text=Remember that you are not their real parent and that they will still feel devoted to the biological parent that you have replaced .
#Text=They may also only listen to your spouse before warming up to you .
#Text=Do not begin calling them “ son ” or “ daughter . ”
#Text=Let the relationship grow before jumping into that .
#Text=Do be strong in the household , whether they listen to you or not .
#Text=Make sure the stepchild knows that they are to respect you and are not free to do whatever they please .
#Text=Your spouse should have your back and do their best to encourage the child to cooperate .
#Text=Enforce the rules .
#Text=If they do not listen to you , let them suffer the consequences .
#Text=Appropriate punishments would be grounding them or not letting them do a fun thing .
#Text=Plotting to kill your stepchild may be too much .
#Text=Do n’t let your new stepchild feel rejected by you .
#Text=How you act towards them will seem amplified .
#Text=If you get angry , it will feel stronger than what they receive from their parents .
#Text=Make sure that your stepchild understand why you ’re angry with them .
#Text=Ask them questions to make them feel heard and understood .
#Text=Children do n’t like to feel unloved , and they are quick to feel rejected .
#Text=How you treat them in the beginning can have a huge impact on your future relationship .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Always consider the perspective of the stepchild
#Text=Do n't be too strict , or too much of a pushover
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Plotting to kill your stepchild will result in chaos .
#Text=Do not employ his/her friends as spies .
#Text=This leads to distrust .
